summary:
The Sovereign Military Order of Malta (SMOM) is a Catholic religious group with a long history, dating back to around 1099. It was once a military order, known as the Knights Hospitaller. Today, it has about 13,500 members, including knights, dames, and chaplains. The order is led by a prince and grand master.

SMOM provides humanitarian aid worldwide, helping those in need without regard to their background. They have a large team of medical professionals and volunteers working in over 120 countries. The order also has its own passports, coins, and stamps, and its buildings in Rome have special status.
title: Sovereign Military Order of Malta
